channel.description: Recent content in tdd on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 17: TDD with Ian Cooper
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Ian Cooper to chat about Test Driven Development (TDD)! We discussed pain points that a lot of people hit when attempting to do TDD, and how to avoid them. Links from the show Ian’s Social Links Twitter LinkedIn Github Other links from the show Ian’s Presentations on Github Ian’s talk - ‘TDD - Where did it all go wrong?
